greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Characteristic function of A336359, numbers k for which A001222(A000203(k)) < A001222(k).
comment: If a(x) = a(y) = 1 and gcd(x,y) = 1, then a(x*y) = 1 also. If a(x) = a(y) = 0 and gcd(x,y) = 1, then a(x*y) = 0 also. This follows because both A001222 and A058063 are additive sequences, their difference A336386 is also.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
